verbs.description: Unless you [V: ’ve] been trapped in a cave for the past 48 hours , you must be aware that Samantha Bee — a biting comedian and astute political commentator — instigated a brouhaha by calling Ivanka Trump a rather blunt and shocking ( to many ) term on her show ....
